title: ‘RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time’
body_html:
In calling torch.nn.init.orthogonal, the error like below has occurred.
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 328, in orthogonal
orthogonal(tensor.data, gain=gain)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 342, in orthogonal
q, r = torch.qr(flattened)
RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time
at /home/xxx/pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THLapack.c:237

body:
In calling torch.nn.init.orthogonal, the error like below has occurred.
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 328, in orthogonal
    orthogonal(tensor.data, gain=gain)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 342, in orthogonal
    q, r = torch.qr(flattened)
RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time
 at /home/xxx/pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THLapack.c:237
